 I have been talking to yanshosh through IM and he has confided to me he is a 
communist. Now to the order of our country we must declare war on him. He has 
admited this to me. Now I say we all take a ride to yanshosh's house and 
throw grenades at it. Everyone okay with that?

(just a reminder im just kidding)
